title: Flag
description: white textile with multicolored decoration with beadwork and sequins; beadwork imagery consists of a man in a green cloak standing over a figure dressed in blue; the man in green holds a stick in his left hand and stands in front of a brown animal, likely a horse; symbols decorate flag\'s four corners; flag\'s background consists of purple beads; according to donor\'s inventory, flag depicts \"St. George and Dragon\": word \"MIREILLE\" (sp?) appear at flag\'s top
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
